title: Authenticating problem solve (EUNE)
body: I restarted my internet router and worked perfectly after that. I had reinstalled the game and used the hextech~~shit~~  but none of that worked. Just a simple restart.{{summoner:6}} back to playing

replies.body: As it turns out, the EU servers ran into some problems earlier today and some players weren't able to stay connected or login. It should all be cleaned up as of now, but let me know if you still can't get signed in!
Update; First championselect and the client crashes, giving me a loss to promos
And the problem is back! I can't log in ! :) RITO FIX RIOT FIX
